title: Miscellaneous learning
description: Quick overview of in gRPC,Kafka,misroservices,Angular js,Ansible,Kubernetes operators,docker images etc

courses.title: Scenario with gRPC and Maven integration
courses.description: In this scenario we will see how we can run simple Hello world gRPC example in Java and how to setup workspace/dependency using Maven

courses.title: kubernetes operator with goLang
courses.description: Kubernetes operator written in goLang - how to write CRD , implement reconciliation loop and deploy the operator

courses.title: Use of Namespaces and cgroups in Docker
courses.description: Scenario we go deep in docker about how it uses Linux namespaces and cgroup to control containers resources

courses.title: Copy on Write
courses.description: Scenario we learn how docker uses Copy on write to make a writable layer on top of read-only image layers
